00017 namespace ndarray {

00020 template <typename Array_>
00021 struct ComplexExtractor {
00022     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Array_>::Element ComplexElement;
00023     typedef typename boost::remove_const<ComplexElement>::type ComplexValue;
00024     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Array_>::ND ND;
00025     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( boost::is_complex<ComplexValue>::value );
00026     typedef typename ComplexValue::value_type RealValue;
00027     typedef typename boost::mpl::if_<
00028         boost::is_const<ComplexElement>, RealValue const, RealValue
00029         >::type RealElement;
00030     typedef ArrayRef<RealElement,ND::value,0> Result;
00031     typedef detail::ArrayAccess<Result> Access;
00032     typedef Vector<int,ND::value> Index;
00033 
00034     static inline Result apply(Array_ const & array, int offset) {
00035         return Access::construct(
00036             reinterpret_cast<RealElement*>(array.getData()) + offset,
00037             Access::Core::create(array.getShape(), array.getStrides() * 2, array.getManager())
00038         );
00039     }
00040 };
00041 
00042 } // namespace detail

00051 template <typename T_, typename T, int N, int C>
00052 Array<T_,N,C>
00053 const_array_cast(Array<T,N,C> const & array) {
00054     return detail::ArrayAccess< Array<T_,N,C> >::construct(
00055         const_cast<T_*>(array.getData()),
00056         detail::ArrayAccess< Array<T,N,C> >::getCore(array)
00057     );
00058 }
00059 
00064 template <int C_, typename T, int N, int C>
00065 Array<T,N,C_>
00066 static_dimension_cast(Array<T,N,C> const & array) {
00067     return detail::ArrayAccess< Array<T,N,C_> >::construct(
00068         array.getData(),
00069         detail::ArrayAccess< Array<T,N,C> >::getCore(array)
00070     );
00071 }
00072 
00080 template <int C_, typename T, int N, int C>
00081 Array<T,N,C_>
00082 dynamic_dimension_cast(Array<T,N,C> const & array) {
00083     Vector<int,N> shape = array.getShape();
00084     Vector<int,N> strides = array.getStrides();
00085     if (C_ >= 0) {
00086         int n = 1;
00087         for (int i=1; i <= C_; ++i) {
00088             if (strides[N-i] != n) return Array<T,N,C_>();
00089             n *= shape[N-i];
00090         }
00091     } else {
00092         int n = 1;
00093         for (int i=0; i < -C_; ++i) {
00094             if (strides[i] != n) return Array<T,N,C_>();
00095             n *= strides[i];
00096         }
00097     }
00098     return static_dimension_cast<C_>(array);
00099 }

00104 template <typename Array_>
00105 typename detail::ComplexExtractor<Array_>::Result
00106 getReal(Array_ const & array) {
00107     return detail::ComplexExtractor<Array_>::apply(array, 0);
00108 }
00109 
00113 template <typename Array_>
00114 typename detail::ComplexExtractor<Array_>::Result
00115 getImag(Array_ const & array) {
00116     return detail::ComplexExtractor<Array_>::apply(array, 1);
00117 }

00125 template <int Nf, typename T, int N, int C>
00126 inline typename boost::enable_if_c< ((C+Nf-N)>=1), ArrayRef<T,Nf,(C+Nf-N)> >::type
00127 flatten(Array<T,N,C> const & input) {
00128     typedef detail::ArrayAccess< ArrayRef<T,Nf,(C+Nf-N)> > Access;
00129     typedef typename Access::Core Core;
00130     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(C+Nf-N >= 1);
00131     Vector<int,N> oldShape = input.getShape();
00132     Vector<int,Nf> newShape = oldShape.template first<Nf>();
00133     for (int n=Nf; n<N; ++n)
00134         newShape[Nf-1] *= oldShape[n];
00135     Vector<int,Nf> newStrides = input.getStrides().template first<Nf>();
00136     newStrides[Nf-1] = 1;
00137     return Access::construct(input.getData(), Core::create(newShape, newStrides, input.getManager()));
00138 }
